title: It Always Ends The Same 6
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module CSS]]
#page-title{display:none}

 :root{
     --link-color: 221, 17, 17;
     --visited-link-color: 221, 17, 17;
     --hover-link-color: 221, 102, 17;
}
[[/module]]

[[=image phone.PNG]]

You've been texting them for a week or so now. 

You've played it cool, cooler than before. No double messaging, no instant responses. 

The rapport's good -- a genuine connection. You pluck up the courage to ask them out, but the decision is to where:


[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: 1.0em 1.0em; text-align: center; border: 8px solid #141618; background-color: #a3a1a6; width: 50%;"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-always-ends-the-same/offset/7 | Casual drinks, followed by the restaurant nears theirs they mentioned when you first met.]]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="font-weight:bold;padding: 1.0em 1.0em; text-align: center; border: 8px solid #141618; background-color: #a3a1a6; width: 50%;"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-always-ends-the-same/offset/8 |A museum in the centre of town, their choice. Potentially followed by a walk around the tourist spots.]]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
author: Dysadron
